professional_summary: 5 years of hands-on experience in Agile Methodology, including Scrum, Kanban, and SAFe. Prior experience as a database admin with 7+ years in IT, managing software life cycles from concept to delivery.

key_responsibilities: Oversaw frameworks used in app creation.
Suggested Ionic framework for efficiency and fast-to-market environment.
Conducted daily stand-up meetings
backlog grooming
and retrospective meetings to track project progress.
Improved team velocity through capacity planning in sprint planning sessions.
Removed team impediments daily to enable delivery of sprint goals and deliverables.
Created business requirement documents and acted as liaison between business and software development teams during high-level reviews.
Liaised between teams
coordinated project meetings
and managed JIRA workflows.
Tracked metrics and performance indicators for project success.
Implemented Agile/Scrum methodology across teams.
Trained and mentored HR applications group in Agile practices.
Contributed to development of PMO artifacts and process improvements.
Coordinated project meetings
including daily stand-ups
sprint planning
and retrospectives.
Identified and resolved obstacles impacting project progress.

education.degree: Bachelor's in Math and Computer Science
